name: Teeny Sheep
description:
Produce enough wool to - of course - Save The World! Can you TAP FAST enough? CLICK - TAP - BUILD and farm away - even when you're not playing!

5 REASONS TO PLAY TEENY SHEEP

► SUPER EASY GAMEPLAY Just keep tapping the screen. Tap! Tap! Tapped!

► CLICK & CASH Casual & addictive gameplay for players who love to Click, Click & make money

► TAP & BUILD Build your farm, make money, do researches, make even more money.

► UPGRADE & GROW Plan your investments and level up your farm with multiple upgrades.

► UNIQUE VISUALS Flock of sheep on your farm with a pet dog to keep them in line, cunning eagles to hunt and carrier storks to steal from with amazing 3D visuals and captivating scenery.

Winter is coming and the world needs wool - Tap like a tycoon and clone as many sheep as you can to grow and upgrade your farm to make MONEY.

Lay back and enjoy your story to world rescue in the idle clicker game with an amazing & addicted game-play.

~~~~~~~~~~~
